name: Leib
text:
...Huh?
What are you all gathered here for—

name: Alp
text:
Leib-senpai, shh, be quiet!
Yuma-kun is in the middle of a crucial moment!

name: Alp
text:
Apparently, there's a special live show for his favorite idol,
and the ticket lottery results are about to be announced.

name: Leib
text:
So you're all watching over him...
Well, just another day in Ueno, I guess.

For the next five minutes or so,
the Beastman's Manor was filled with a tense atmosphere.

A live show by a currently trending artist.
A fierce competition is expected for the lottery, but the outcome—

name: Hastur
text:
...Hmph, there is nothing to worry about, Yuma.
I shall raise my Yellow Sign, and snatch it from someone else.

name: Pazuzu
text:
Wait, calm down, my dear lizard.
It's okay, I'll solve it peacefully with coins!

name: Yuma
text:
Your feelings, are enough. I, just a fan.
Everyone, should have, equal chance.

name: Pazuzu
text:
But, are you sure it's alright?
It's a live show commemorating the theme park's reopening, is it not?

name: Yuma
text:
High lottery odds, mean Am-sama is popular.
That's the proof, so I'm happy... *sniffle*.

name: Alp
text:
A-As expected of a model otaku...!
Even if we can't go to the live show, let's all go play together!

Amidst the words of encouragement for Yuma,
Leib, who was looking up the event on his device, muttered.

name: Leib
text:
...That idol's live show?
There does seem to be a special seating area.

name: Leib
text:
Sponsors aside, apparently any staff who wanted
to can also sit in the special area.

name: Yuma
text:
That, in other words,
if I become staff member, I can watch live show...?

name: Yuma
text:
And not only the live show, that I can watch,
but I can, also be of help, to Am-sama...!?

name: Hastur
text:
Are you serious...? Not only is it overflowing with the rabble,
but you'll have to keep interacting with them!?

name: Yuma
text:
Uhm... Being surrounded,
by a lot of strangers, is very scary.

name: Yuma
text:
I... I'll think, a little.
If it's a proper way, as a fan, want to try, everything.

Just a few dozen minutes later,
Yuma decided to apply for the staff position.

Chapter 1:
Paradise Under the Blazing Heat

—Meanwhile, about two weeks later.
[Player] was being rocked in a transport vehicle.

As a member of the fire brigade along with Cinderella and Red Hood,
they were heading to the theme park 'T.S.L.' scheduled for renewal.

The underground theme park in Roppongi, 'Tokyo Bandits Leisure Resort',
is a hot topic, with its temporary closure and renovation making the news daily.

Although it's for work, they get to see its new form a step ahead.
Perhaps due to that excitement, a restless atmosphere filled the car.

name: Cinderella
text:
—I never thought I'd be dispatched to a theme park
for disaster prevention at an opening event.

name: Cinderella
text:
I can see a pretty big building from here...
No matter how many years pass, times like these are always exciting.

name: Cinderella
text:
That stuck-up old Fire Commissioner would probably say
that he's tired of seeing just tall buildings.

name: Red Hood
text:
Haha, it's surprising to see our Sandra
getting excited about a theme park.

options.text: She seems so serious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Exactly! I imagine her always scrubbing her ash-covered
firefighting gear by herself whenever she has time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, well, I get what you're trying to say.
Other than that, I train non-stop on my days off.

options.text: She seems like she'd train all the time on her days off.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Exactly! I imagine her always scrubbing her ash-covered
firefighting gear by herself whenever she has time.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hmph, well, I get what you're trying to say.
Other than that, I train non-stop on my days off.

options.text: Don't you think she'd play non-stop if she went?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ahaha, with Sandra's physique, she'd probably go non-stop from opening to closing!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Do you even need a break in a place to play?
You should have enough stamina to last until the date changes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-As expected of the inexhaustible old hag...
No wonder her one-handed rope climbing speed rivals my two-handed climbing.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha, I was just kidding.
But I can't even imagine, the image of myself playing around.

name: Cinderella
text:
But, I'm not a exceedingly serious person either.
I just know that when a real fire breaks out, I can't rely on anyone but myself.

name: Cinderella
text:
In the burning flames, I'm always the last one dancing.
So, I do my best to be prepared when that moment comes...

name: Cinderella
text:
Besides, it's not that I dislike such places.
It's just that I've never had the opportunity to be invited.

name: Cinderella
text:
In the first place, being a firefighter
is the role that was required of me here—

name: Cinderella
text:
As a firefighter, I just didn't
have a reason to go alone, that's all.

The transport vehicle arrived at the Roppongi Station staff-only area.
And they joined up with what looked like other staff members.

And, as they waited for a few minutes,
a familiar figure walked towards them.

name: Oscar
text:
Greetings, firefighters, welcome!
I, the art director of this event, will personally guide you.

name: Oscar
text:
As you know, we're renovating the entire
theme park located in the basement here.

name: Oscar
text:
So for our reopening ceremony, I'd like to borrow the strength
of everyone who has gathered, or so to speak.

name: Cinderella
text:
...What's with this mysterious person?
Are we actually having a masquerade ball?

options.text: I'd like you to introduce yourself first.
What a luxurious welcome, Oscar!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text: If my welcome is a luxury for you, then there is nothing that could make me happier!

options.text: Ugh, this is getting me anxious.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh my, you look as if you've seen a villain.
Rest assured, I'm always behind the scenes, yes?

name: Oscar
text:
...My apologies for the late introduction, everyone from the fire department.
I am Oscar, a playwright from Yurakucho. It is my pleasure to make your acquaintance.

name: Oscar
text:
My main job is writing scripts and directing plays,
but sometimes I'm invited as an external art director.

name: Oscar
text:
You can think of me as a producer
in a broader sense, if you'd like.

name: Red Hood
text:
No way, it's Oscar-san!?
I-I've never seen him in person before... I wonder if he'd write a story about me?

name: Cinderella
text:
Is he a celebrity?
I'm not really up on that kind of trend.

name: Red Hood
text:
The tickets to every single one of his stage plays are a must-have!
I can't believe the day would come when I'd meet him in person.

name: Red Hood
text:
...Wait, [Player], you know him!?
You have to tell me more about him later!!

note: Red Hood is a fanboy, that's very cute

options.text: A lot has happened.
Actually, we're lovers.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, so you've finally decided to make it public.
We must prepare for your debut in high society at once.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...!!?
L-L-Lovers!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, no, Reddy, this is the 'boy who cried wolf' type of thing.
Aren't you taking it a bit too seriously?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Haha, is it truth or fiction?
Of course, for me, either would be exquisite.

options.text: No, this is our first time meeting.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Red Hood
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No way!?
You were talking like you were best buds, so I thought you were close.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahaha!
It seems my memories with [Player] were a work of fiction, then?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But now, it's about to cross that boundary and become the truth.
I'm looking forward to the memories we'll make from now on, [Player].

name: Oscar
text:
Let's save the fun for later,
and first go to the site and meet up with the other staff.

The group proceeded through the staff-only passage
and were guided to an elevator installed at the back.

name: Oscar
text:
We're descending further below the Tokyo Casino,
to the joint business area of Gyumao-dono and Hakumen-dono.

name: Oscar
text:
This time, from the original 'Desert Oasis' theme,
I've transformed it into a 'Tropical Resort' with my own hands!

As the doors of the large elevator opened,
warm, humid air flowed in.

name: Red Hood
text:
—We're outside!!
We just came down from inside, right!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, I'm certainly surprised.
The civilization of this world is truly interesting.

options.text: The usual mysterious technology.
I can feel the sea breeze...!
I can't see the ceiling.

name: Oscar
text:
No, it's even better than the real thing.
Pursuing that is my aesthetic.

name: Oscar
text:
I want to surprise people as much as possible, you see.
As such, the latest technology is being utilized to come up with a lot of ideas.

name: Oscar
text:
For example, this climate that you're all feeling.
It's possible to make it cool and comfortable, but that would be boring.

name: Oscar
text:
Yes, a moderate amount of humidity
enhances the coldness of the pool and the drinks.

name: Oscar
text:
Thanks to widespread use of the natural elements,
this place is near indistinguishable from a real tropical country—

name: Oscar
text:
The sky that changes from day, evening, and night
creates a sense of loneliness as the limited time approaches.

name: Oscar
text:
Even the fatigue from walking around,
I've transformed into part of the entertainment itself.

options.text: A perfectly calculated stage art.
At this point, wouldn't the real thing be better?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
It's dramatic, precisely because it's like paper-mache, isn't it?
For me, this place is a sweet, sweet, ideal paradise that goes beyond the idea of a project.

options.text: It also encourages repeating visits, doesn't it?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Exactly. The sense of unease eventually leads to the will to return.
I'm happy that you understand that much.

name: Oscar
text:
My clients liked it too, you know?
Now, I'm in charge of the on-site supervision.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, that's enough about the facility,
let's get straight to business.

name: Oscar
text:
I'll guide you in order,
so please wait a moment.

name: Red Hood
text:
Wow~ I didn't really think about it too much,
but this is getting me extremely excited!!

name: Cinderella
text:
With a place this big, it'll be tough to confirm the escape routes and
grasp the locations of the fire prevention equipment... And then—

name: Red Hood
text:
You're thinking about work again!
Let's forget about time and have fun for now, Sandra.

options.text: The hotel might be interesting.
Let's all go to the pool during our break!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yeah, go ahead.
But not to the extent that you're too tired to move in an emergency.

options.text: Well, we're here as the fire brigade.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahahahaha!!
Good. Wouldn't you learn from your junior, Reddy?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, you could at least go during your break.
But not to the extent that you're too tired to move in an emergency.

text:
The gathered staff were told their jobs in order
and headed to their posts.

Perhaps because they were in a separate category from the staff,
[Player] and the others were left until the end.

name: Oscar
text:
Sorry to keep you waiting.
And once again, I'm Oscar.

name: Oscar
text:
Thank you again for your trouble.
I'll be counting on you for a while.

name: Oscar
text:
At the new T.S.L., we'll be holding several shows.
As stated in the preliminary documents, many of them will use fire and explosives.

name: Oscar
text:
Of course, it's theoretically safe.
However, if there's a flaw in the premise of that on-paper theory, it's meaningless.

name: Oscar
text:
I want to reduce the risk to our customers to as close to zero as possible.
That's precisely why I wanted your seal of approval.

name: Oscar
text:
To me, it's worth more than a legally required investigation.
Please, lend me your help to add another page to the story of my success.

Just the usual atmosphere of scheming.
But, for once, Oscar says it seriously.

name: Red Hood
text:
I-I'm Red Hood!
N-nice to meet you, Oscar-san!!

name: Red Hood
text:
This person is my senior, Cinderella!
And this is my junior...
Wait, you already know each other!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Ahahaha!
I'm happy to see you so excited.
How long has it been?

name: Red Hood
text:
Sandra...!
Stop it right there!?

name: Cinderella
text:
Haha... I'm just as Reddy introduced me.
I'll be in your care for a while.

name: Oscar
text:
Cinderella...
The name of the 'ash-covered girl' from the fairy tale.

name: Cinderella
text:
...Is something wrong with it?
Is there something you want to say to that?

name: Oscar
text:
Not at all! I just think it's a great name.
All the world's a stage, and all the men and women merely players.
Just precisely 'as one would like it'.

name: Oscar
text:
...Now, now, well then, shall we
move on to our request for the three of you?

name: Oscar
text:
Today, I'd like you to inspect the equipment for the special concert
to be held on the reopening day, and to check on the evacuation routes.

name: Cinderella
text:
Ah, just as the preliminary documents said.
We're ready to set out.

name: Red Hood
text:
Then I guess I'll check
the evacuation routes?

name: Red Hood
text:
I'll probably finish up first,
so I'll help with the equipment inspection after that.

options.text: Wait, what's my job...?
I'll help with one of them too!
Oscar, can I go on a date with you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Of course!
I'll be your personal guide to the facility.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
You two sure are good friends.
Putting [Player] aside, are you sure about this, Director!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahahaha! Of course, it is simply a joke.
My rendezvous with you will begin with a more modest escort, yes?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Good grief...
So you're good friends.
Well then, I guess I'll ask [Player] to do some work too.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Oh, what a shame...
Well then, I guess I'll get back to my personal business.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'll inspect the fire extinguishing equipment on the audience side.
[Player], you take care of the backstage.

name: Cinderella
text:
I'll send the materials we used in the classroom lectures
to your device, so check them as you go.

name: Cinderella
text:
The rest of you ash-covered ones, follow me!
You better don't think you have all the time in the world, finish it in 30 minutes.

At Cinderella's words,
the firefighting university students responded in perfect unison.

[Player] does as they're told,
and checks the equipment in the stage's staff area.

Whether the fire hydrants and fire extinguishers are in the correct positions,
whether the number of sprinklers and fire detectors meets the standards—

While checking against the preliminary documents,
[Player] proceeds with the work smoothly.

...I followed the premonition and came along.
I guess you could call this a coincidence, my problem child.

name: Shennong
text:
Hey, it's been a while since last week's break time.
I heard the fire brigade was coming, but I didn't expect a student to be included.

name: Shennong
text:
I came here when I saw the premonition, but you've come first again.
I can only imagine how hard your homeroom teacher had to put himself through.

name: Shennong
text:
It's a huge coincidence, but I was also called as a part of the first aid team.
I was just setting up the life-saving equipment and stretchers.

name: Shennong
text:
There will probably be many situations where we need to cooperate.
I'm counting on you, fire brigade.

options.text: I'm happy to see you outside of school too!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
O-oh...
This flatterer is really hopeless.

options.text: You were called for work too, teach!?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, are you happy?
I'm also happy because I can watch over you to make sure you don't do anything reckless...
I hope that's a joke.

options.text: That summer outfit looks good on you, Shennong.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
They said they wanted the staff to blend in with the world view as performers.
...So they specified seasonal clothes.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'm glad you liked it.
But if you're trying to distract me, you're being way too naive, yeah?

name: Shennong
text:
Really, moody and instinctively straightforward.
That part of you reminds me of someone from a long time ago—

name: Shennong
text:
Hm, who am I talking about?
...Well, nobody.

name: Shennong
text:
But to think you joined the fire brigade without me knowing.
Do you even have brakes in that brain of yours?

name: Shennong
text:
Well, it seems you told your homeroom teacher,
and I'm just... the school nurse to you, I guess.

name: Shennong
text:
Well, it doesn't matter.
I'll let it slide that you unraveled and toyed with my heart.

options.text: You definitely haven't let it slide.
It's a misunderstanding, Shennong-sensei.
There might or might not be a deeper reason...

text:
Before Shennong and the others could continue their conversation,
their gazes shifted to behind [Player].

name: Shennong
text:
...You, what's wrong?
Do you need something from us?
You do look like a staff member...

name: Yuma
text:
Ah, um, I'm sorry...
[Player], I didn't think, you'd be here.

options.text: Y-Yuma?
What are you doing here!?
You came out of your cage in Ueno!?

name: Yuma
text:
Finally found, someone I know.
Want to talk to you...

options.text: You were a staff member as well, Yuma!?
So, what's wrong?
Your fan merch looks great.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, thank you.
...For some reason, I feel, relieved.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
One, favorite limited edition pin, please take.
Coated with protective film, can put on bag, without worry.

When [Player] accepts the pin, Yuma smiles happily.
But his expression soon clouds over.

name: Yuma
text:
...I, became staff member.
That way, get special deal, can watch Am-sama's live show.

name: Yuma
text:
And, to become a staff member,
also mean, to help Am-sama's stage...

name: Yuma
text:
So, worked hard and did job, as told.
Made it here, have to do properly.

As he talks, Yuma looks like he's about to cry,
and Shennong and [Player] exchange glances to each other.

name: Yuma
text:
But, after that, don't know, what to do.
Must be more, things, need to be done.

name: Yuma
text:
Staff chat, but everyone busy.
Looking for, staff leader, but cannot find...

name: Yuma
text:
People, stare a lot. That alone, scary.
Don't know, what to do, so—

options.text: And so you set out to find me.
Aren't the others from Ueno Academy here?
(Pat Yuma's head)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uu... Uuugg...
Seeing you, really happy...

name: Yuma
text:
...Everyone from Ueno Academy,
tell, to become staff members.

name: Yuma
text:
But, I know. Everyone, has assignment. Have research.
Don't want, take up everyone's time, for my sake.

name: Shennong
text:
Scared of other people's gazes, huh? But you still applied to be
a staff member for your goal. That's admirable in itself.

name: Shennong
text:
I won't ask for the details, and if you're trying your best,
I want to help. The simplest solution is—

name: Shennong
text:
—to act with the
reliable [Player]-kun right here.

name: Shennong
text:
Well, it'll require some adjustments, but it's not impossible, yes?
Of course, that's only if you're okay with it, [Player]-kun?

options.text: Of course, I'll help him out.
Well, I can't just leave him alone...
You seem pretty enthusiastic, teach.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Well, yeah. There's a reason to that. Want to know?
If you behave yourself, I'll tell you eventually.

name: Shennong
text:
You're a general security staff member and have free time now, right?
Then I can give you a job under my authority as the first aid team's leader.

name: Shennong
text:
I can't exactly give [Player] direct orders,
but the first aid team and the fire brigade are always working together.

name: Shennong
text:
I'll let the person in charge of the fire brigade know.
A medical officer's say isn't small in a public organization, yes?

name: Shennong
text:
Even if it's not the same job,
we can at least have you work nearby—

name: Yuma
text:
Ah... but, it's alright. Can manage, by myself.
[Player], and everyone, can't cause more trouble...!

name: Yuma
text:
Will look for, staff leader, a little longer.
[Player], was nice to see you.

name: Shennong
text:
...Hey, hey, that's the venue exit, so
I don't think the chief staff will be there.

—Greetings, everyone. If you want to set the stage,
there's no one more suitable than me... Right?

name: Oscar
text:
Well, it's been a while.
I just happened to have an errand nearby, really, just by chance?

name: Oscar
text:
By no means! Was I curious about
[Player]'s situation and eavesdropping, but—

name: Oscar
text:
I've got a general grasp of the situation.
Please, if you would let me lend you a hand!

options.text: Your timing is suspiciously good.
Are you really just passing by...?
So, how far have you gotten?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Oscar
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ah, as expected, you understand me.
I've already contacted all the parties, so we can start right away.

name: Shennong
text:
Good grief... Though, if you're offering to help,
I won't make any unnecessary comments.

name: Yuma
text:
Is it, really okay?
[Player], everyone.

name: Oscar
text:
The staff are the performers
who make this stage possible.

name: Oscar
text:
To make the story shine,
that is my job as the beauty behind the curtains.

options.text: We're friends, right?
I'm more comfortable with the two of you.
A pat on the head will be enough as thanks.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
A-a pat...? You'll pat me?
Or, I, pat you? Either, is fine...

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
But, that, make me happy.
Will that, be a thank you?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...I guess that's what it will be for this guy.
If you're happy too, I'll turn a blind eye.

name: Yuma
text:
T-Thank you.
Umm, I, Yuma of Ueno Academy.

name: Shennong
text:
I'm Shennong. Nice to meet you, Yuma-kun.
Hmm, Yuma... That Yuma from Ueno Academy?

name: Shennong
text:
Ah, I see, the prodigy of the Ueno Research Institute of Transient Biology.
That Yuma-kun... The leader of that famous research team.

note:
I love obscure wordplays
Shennong calls Yuma a 麒麟児 (kirinji / child of Qilin), which often means a (child) prodigy
Option 3 uses キリン (kirin) instead, which means a giraffe

options.text: You have heard of his name?
Eh, where did you hear that, teach?
Yuma isn't a giraffe.

name: Oscar
text:
They do say that 'it takes one to know one'.
Nah, I'm just saying that off the top of my head.

name: Oscar
text:
Well, you can call me Oscar. My specialty is in aesthetics!
Now, I should be getting replies from everyone soon—

Oscar cuts off his words and checks his device.
The momentary silence is interrupted by a voice from behind.

name: Cinderella
text:
You're having a fun little scheme, aren't you?
Let me in on it, will you? I'm just kidding.

name: Cinderella
text:
It's not a long distance,
so I decided to come in person.

name: Cinderella
text:
I understand the situation for the most part.
If it were that old geezer Raven, he'd probably say to 'use your own head', but still—

name: Cinderella
text:
I'm a hands-on person.
I think that it's best to leave it to the professionals.

name: Cinderella
text:
Besides, giving clear instructions is an important
skill to prevent panic should an emergency comes.

name: Cinderella
text:
Take this opportunity to get used to giving instructions to others.
I have a good idea for the job too, so leave it to me.

options.text: As expected of Cinderella!!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahahaha!
You flatter me so well, you cheeky junior.

options.text: A skilled firefighter is different, Cinderella.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Ahahahaha!
You flatter me so well, you cheeky junior.

options.text: This is Cinderella, our Captain... No, our Chief.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
When Reddy isn't around, will you be the one to introduce me?
You have my gratitude.

name: Cinderella
text:
As introduced, I'm a Captain at the Tokyo Firefighting Academy.
This time... I suppose I'm the Chief of the fire brigade.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well then, let me ask you for a job again.
[Player], hold on to that kid's reins tightly.

name: Yuma
text:
...Thank you, I, do my best,
at part-time job, with [Player]! Woof!

name: Cinderella
text:
If you'd like, you can get along with my Reddy too.
Just maybe— you and he were similar in the past.

name: Yuma
text: ...Reddy?

Humans cannot define 'normal'.
Just as it is impossible to define 'health'.

However, 'abnormal' can be defined.
Just as 'illness' can be defined.

Humans could not define 'the sacred'.
However, they could define 'the evil'.

Therefore, after tracing his geographical ties and roots, his 'undefined' was named with a prayer,
'San Salvador Loupgarou' - 'Holy Savior, Thou Shalt Be Other Than Man'.

—Time passed, since he was born. Shortly after, his ego began to sprout.
What sprouted was the heart of a beastman.

However, no matter how much time passed,
his teeth did not grow sharp, nor did his skin turn to fur.

He was supposed to be a beastman,
but his body grew as a human.

He thought of it as 'embarrassing',
and became afraid of being seen as his 'embarrassing self'.

Thinking he might have some kind of illness,
he devoted himself to biology in order to treat himself.

What he learned after rising to the rank of a special scholarship student at the academy.
Was only that his own mind was 'undefinable'.

But when he became confused and his head was full,
the beast within his heart appeared.

Whether it was a beast or a monster,
whether it was human or not, even that was 'unidentified'.

No one, not even himself,
could define this birth.

Those who cannot be controlled are eliminated, as his academics and history have taught him.
Therefore, Yuma sought a person, who would define and control him.

But that too was hindered by the fear of others' gazes.
So, he had always shut himself in—

And so, [Player] inspects the equipment
in the order Cinderella told them to.

And in the same area,
Yuma was proceeding with various tasks.

[Player] provides support by accompanying Yuma to get instructions
each time, and giving advice on his work.

Perhaps thanks to that, his anxiety seemed to be alleviated,
and Yuma was back to working energetically.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], work done.
Once again, able to help Am-sama's stage.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], how about you?
This inspection work, seem to be, soon finishing?

options.text: This will take a little longer.
You can go get another job first.
What did Shennong tell me again—

name: Shennong
text:
Listen, [Player]-kun.
You can't do everything from 0 to 10 for him.

name: Shennong
text:
Support him from 0 to 5, then from 0 to 3... And so on,
gradually expand the range of what you let him do by himself.

name: Shennong
text:
Human-oriented routine work would be difficult for him.
Although, that may not be the case for 'everything else'.

options.text: Let's go get some instructions together.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Okay!
[Player], together again—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No. I, always rely on [Player].
[Player] has work, too.

options.text: Try getting instructions by yourself.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Me, alone...?
[Player], not coming...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Right. I, always relying.
[Player], have lot of work, as well.

options.text: Question, 'What should we do next!?'

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Eh, eh...!?
Um... Go together, get instructions, from chief!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...No. I, always rely on [Player].
[Player] has work, too.

name: Yuma
text:
Just now, you came along.
How to ask, have learned, so—

Yuma takes a deep breath
and turns his back to [Player].

Then he runs to the staff member with an armband
who is working a short distance away.

name: Yuma
text:
Ah... Umm.
Uh... There's...

name: Staff
text:
You're the kid who came with the fire brigade member earlier, right?
What's wrong, did something happen?

name: Yuma
text:
(Looked at, really looked at...
Uuu... [Player], not here, really scary...)

name: Yuma
text:
Um, work...
Work, is—

name: Staff
text:
Could it be, was there something you didn't
understand about the work I asked you to do earlier?

name: Yuma
text:
Understood, everything well.
Umm—

options.text: You can do it, just a little more.
Oh no, he's looking down.
(Watch from a distance)

name: Staff
text:
...Ah, the belt partition setup that I asked for,
it sure seems to be done nicely.

name: Staff
text:
Looks alright from my point of view,
so have you been given any other instructions?

name: Yuma
text:
[Player]... Yes, [Player] told,
go get, new instructions!

name: Yuma
text:
So, I, want job.
Then... what, to do next?

name: Staff
text:
Understood.
I'll go take a look, so please wait a moment.

Yuma, who was able to ask for instructions by himself,
comes back like a puppy running to fetch a thrown ball.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], got instructions.
Was scary, but asked like you, and turned out okay!

note: my poor poor table having to endure me slamming my fist on it

options.text: Good job, Yuma!
You've grown so much.
(Pat his head)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Woof...
Thanks to you, showing example.
Thank you.

name: Yuma
text:
Heart, still pounding.
But somehow, feel refreshed.

name: Yuma
text:
But I, did not speak, very well.
Earlier person, kind... maybe.

name: Yuma
text:
Yes, everyone, very kind.
So, next time, want to try harder.

name: Yuma
text:
...Still, has not come back, from checking.
Something can help with, until come back?

options.text: Can you hold this inspection tool for me?

dialogue_after_selection.text: After handing Yuma the tool for the fire alarms' inspection, [Player] starts another task.
Yuma received it carefully and waited quietly, occasionally looking at the tool with interest.

options.text: Can you fold up all the signs over there?

dialogue_after_selection.text: Yuma does as instructed and folds up all the signs that indicate an inspection is in progress.
In the meantime, [Player] started on the remaining cleanup work.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
All, collected!
For now, holding on, please tell me, if you need.

options.text: It's okay, you can rest!

dialogue_after_selection.text: Yuma nodded and sat down on the spot, watching [Player]'s work.

text:
When [Player] finished their work on the spot,
Oscar appeared as if it was his cue.

name: Oscar
text:
—It seems that the work here is done.
Then next, I'll ask you to work outside...
Though it's still underground.

name: Oscar
text:
The air conditioning system has been adjusted for
your working conditions, so please rest assured.

name: Oscar
text:
I've already discussed with Cinderella.
I'll be counting on you two.

name: Oscar
text:
And just now, I've had a drink wagon
pre-opened nearby.

name: Oscar
text:
It's free for everyone here today!
Feel free to use it even during work.

And like so, Yuma was instructed to
put up banner flags and posters—

[Player] was told to check the operation of the
outdoor emergency guide lights placed near the stage.

A guide light that shows the evacuation route in case of an emergency.
It's designed to be compatible with various species, and emits light, sound, and smell.

Some are embedded in the road,
and some are mixed in with the decorations.

Using the function installed on [Player]'s device,
they were tested using a demo signal.

options.text: No abnormalities.

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Most of them work as intended.
If a problem is encountered, its individual identification number will be recorded.
According to the disaster prevention plan, these are installed all throughout T.S.L., and several days are expected to be able to inspect them all.

options.text: This guide light isn't responding...

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Most of them work as intended.
If a problem is encountered, its individual identification number will be recorded.
According to the disaster prevention plan, these are installed all throughout T.S.L., and several days are expected to be able to inspect them all.

options.text: (Check on Yuma)

text:
Meanwhile, Yuma is putting up posters
in a slightly distant location.

While watching him for a while,
[Player]'s eyes suddenly meet Yuma's.

Yuma noticed and walked
towards [Player].

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], how is it?
I, have fun. Feel like being helpful, to Am-sama.

name: Yuma
text:
With you, close by,
can see any time, feeling reassured.

options.text: Same here.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thank you.
For, holding my reins.

options.text: I'm glad you seem to have calmed down.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Thank you.
For, holding my reins.

options.text: Shall we slack off together?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Slacking off, bad!
Jambavan crying, because Leib slack off!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: Want proper break, with [Player], later.

name: Yuma
text:
By the way, [Player], posters, all put up.
Next, flagpole, but don't know where—

name: Yuma
text:
...No, right.
Learned from [Player], earlier.

Yuma takes a deep breath and then, with a firm step,
walks towards the staff member in charge of instructions.

Haha... As expected, letting them go through a tough situation
is the shortcut to helping young people grow.

options.text: You scared me—

dialogue_after_selection.text: They turn around after being suddenly spoken to from behind, but there's no one there who could have been the speaker.
—At that moment, a feeling like being caught in the wind races through [Player]'s entire body.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Guhuhu, carelessness is your greatest enemy.
You still need more training, but other than that, you seem to have grown a lot.

options.text: (Turn towards the voice)

dialogue_after_selection.text: They turn around after being suddenly spoken to from behind, but there's no one there who could have been the speaker.
—At that moment, a feeling like being caught in the wind races through [Player]'s entire body.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Guhuhu, carelessness is your greatest enemy.
You still need more training, but other than that, you seem to have grown a lot.

options.text: (Thrust your fist towards the source of the chill)

dialogue_after_selection.text:
Was it a defensive instinct, or accumulated experience?
The attack [Player] unleashed hit its mark perfectly—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Woah!!
To predict the movements of this great master, you are truly amazing...

name: Hogen
text:
—Kahahaha!
I'm glad to see you're well, [Player].

options.text: Long time no see, and farewell.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, stop trying to call the cops!
Prank calls are strictly forbidden!
Well, the one who pranked was me—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I'm really sorry!
It's been a while, so I just, you know?
We're close, aren't we?

options.text: (Activate the device's reporting function)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Hey, hey, stop trying to call the cops!
Prank calls are strictly forbidden!
Well, the one who pranked was me—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
No, I'm really sorry!
It's been a while, so I just, you know?
We're close, aren't we?

options.text: You're the same as always, Master Hogen.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Right, right.
I still have a hidden trick up my sleeve.
I'll show it to you next time.

name: Hogen
text:
As you may have guessed,
I've been called as an advisor to the security staff.

name: Hogen
text:
In case of an emergency,
we'll also have to coordinate with you disaster prevention personnel.

name: Hogen
text:
So just like that,
I've come to greet you.

As Hogen said that, he turned his gaze to Yuma,
who was receiving instructions from a staff member.

name: Hogen
text:
Hmm, I've been watching for a while,
but there seems to be no need to worry.

name: Hogen
text:
—That's right. Just a little while ago,
that kid wandered into the security room.

name: Hogen
text:
He seemed to be quite upset.
I got worried and went looking for him, and then I found you too.

name: Hogen
text:
But as expected of my beloved disciple, you have divine speed not only
in the distance between yourself and others, but also between others.

name: Hogen
text:
If you could shorten the distance with me
a little more... I'm just kidding.

name: Hogen
text:
Well, if I talk for too long,
my pretty little subordinates will give me a scary look. See you around.

With that, Hogen disappeared in an instant
to his students at the Kiou Police Academy.

As if to replace him,
Yuma returns to [Player].

name: Yuma
text:
Was told, can take break.
Next job, in an hour.

name: Yuma
text:
...[Player], a break, when?
Would timing, match?

name: Yuma
text:
If, can take break,
want drink at wagon, go together...

options.text: I haven't been told when my break is.
Let's ask Cinderella.
Okay, let's go on a date.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Very, happy.
I, walk with [Player], just once—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Date!?
[Player], just say, date?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
If [Player], have time,
I... I, would gladly.

text:
[Player] asks about the break
in the fire brigade chat.

Then immediately, a reply comes back their way:
'Anytime is fine as long as you let me know'.

name: Yuma
text:
We can go, together?
...Yay. Ahem, please wait, a minute. I, check location—

name: Yuma
text:
Ah...
Out of stock, temporarily suspended...

name: Yuma
text:
Sorry, [Player].
Seems, can't go right away...

options.text: Should we kill time until it reopens?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uhm...
Then, want to go to pool, maybe.

options.text: Should we go to the pool or something?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Want to go.
Don't have swimsuit, but no problem.

options.text: Is there anywhere you want to go?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Uhm...
Then, want to go to pool, maybe.

name: Yuma
text:
Pool, like real sea, or river.
Have been curious, since arrival.

So until the drink wagon reopens,
the two decide to visit a nearby pool.

To check if swimming was allowed,
they looked for a staff member in charge instead of going in right away.

name: Pool Staff
text:
—Welcome!
All areas of the pool are available!

name: Pool Staff
text:
The high-performance purification system is currently in function, so you can wear clothes.
However, please make sure it does not interfere with your work.

name: Yuma
text:
Wow, really like, a river.
At first look, cannot know as man-made.

name: Yuma
text:
...Sorry, [Player],
I, can't take it, anymore—!

name: Yuma
text:
Phew! Ahaha, cold.
I, usually in cage, so things like this, not used to.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], join me?
Or, throw ball... hah hah, woof woof!

options.text: (Jump in)
(Throw the beach ball)
(Jump in with the ball)

text:
Until the drink wagon reopens,
[Player] enjoys the pool with Yuma.

Then, after drying off to the point where water isn't dripping,
they head to get a drink this time.

Perhaps because it had been closed,
there was a line of staff at the drink wagon.

name: Yuma
text:
It's popular. A bit, excited.
Maybe can see menu, if can move up a little.

name: Yuma
text:
—Ah, [Player],
carefully listen, for a moment.

options.text: (Listen carefully)
It sounds like a bird is chirping.
I think I recognize this cry—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], you understand?
Surprised, perhaps, know about living things?

name: Yuma
text:
This, cry of a bird, of a warm other world.
And, isn't recording. Live voice.

name: Yuma
text:
Only vegetation, different.
Many, real living creatures, present.

name: Yuma
text:
Ecosystem, considered.
Perhaps, for living creatures, this place, more tropical than real thing.

name: Yuma
text:
Temperature, said to be lowered, a little,
but usually warmer, to maintain.

options.text: So that's what it was.
Yuma, you understood that, amazing.
So they standardized it to a subtropical environment.

name: Yuma
text:
Yes! Very sure.
Oscar, a playwright, protecting worldview.

name: Yuma
text:
Worldview, about 'living space'.
This, place for creatures, can only live here.

name: Yuma
text:
Biology, if interested, can lend interesting book.
Favorite book, after Am-sama.

name: Yuma
text:
I, scholarship student, at Ueno Academy.
Know more than, Am-sama's songs, yes.

name: Yuma
text:
...By the way, this line,
not moving, for a while. What—

Just as Yuma stretched his neck and stood on his tiptoes,
to see what was happening at the front of the line...

name: Yuma
text:
That... slime? Wander in, maybe?
Certainly, here, good place for habitat—

name: Yuma
text:
Ah, [Player]!
Fire, coming, from wagon!

name: Yuma
text:
Just now, from wagon window, saw slime.
Might be some left.

options.text: Um, the emergency manual—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
[Player], to put out human fire, don't know.
But, about other living things, leave it to me!

options.text: I'll get ready to extinguish the fire!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes! But, don't know, to put out human fire.
But, about other living things, leave it to me!

options.text: Yuma, please take care of the slimes!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Yes! But, don't know, to put out human fire.
But, about other living things, leave it to me!

name: Yuma
text:
So, [Player],
please, put out fire!

options.text: Okay, be careful, Yuma!
(Rush to the nearest fire extinguishing equipment)
(Contact Cinderella and the others)

text:
At the same time as [Player] left the scene,
Yuma rummages through his bag.

name: Yuma
text:
Think, in this pocket...
Found it, wolf beastman fur!

name: Yuma
text:
Alright, with this...
Grrrrr—

name: Yuma
text:
Grrrrr!!!
First, evacuate everyone, then slimes—

name: Yuma
text:
—Ah, why, can move,
so much outside, like this?

Just until a little while ago, he was so terrified in front of the
gazes of strangers outside of Ueno that he would lose his composure.

The very body that was supposed to be a beastman,
he was afraid of exposing its unnatural and incomplete form to the outside eye.

This body that was neither human nor beast.
He hated this body that could go wild at any moment, and shut himself in a cage.

He didn't want anyone to see
the self he hated the most. And yet—

name: Staff
text:
S-someone get the security team, quickly.
The slimes are rampaging, we can't handle them alone...!

name: Staff
text:
*cough* *cough*...
The smoke is thick...
A fire extinguisher won't be enough...!

name: Yuma
text:
...Everyone, stay back, call help.
I, save person inside, catch slimes.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player], believed in me,
entrusted place, to me.

name: Yuma
text:
So, for [Player],
until you come back, I, do my best!

Leaving the scene to Yuma for a moment,
[Player] reaches towards the nearest fire hydrant.

The distance to the wagon
is clear enough to be from their point of view.

options.text: The hose seems long enough.
Now, how do I operate this again—
(Prepare as practiced in training)

text:
The most basic training of fire extinguishing
is mandatory for all members of the fire brigade.

Reminding themselves of that time, [Player]
prepares the equipment, activates the water pump, and heads to Yuma.

name: Yuma
text:
—[Player], it's fine here.
Nobody left, in wagon!

options.text: Thanks for your help!
Firefighting, commence!
(Spray water into the wagon)

text:
Water was sprayed to where the fire was starting to spread on the wagon.
After confirming that the combustion is weakening, they gradually step inside.

But even after spraying water for several minutes,
the flames in one part just won't get smaller.

On the contrary,
the flames started to move.

options.text: It's not just burning!?
This flame, is alive!?
It can't be—

name: Yuma
text:
That, slime, won't work with water!
Fire spirit, with same 'faith' roots, as me...

name: Slime
text: Furu furu furu~~~!!!

The slime covered in flames not only resists the water,
but also leaves a trail of fire in its wake.

options.text: It'll be bad if it gets out!
Fighting while extinguishing a fire is just too—
(Keep it in check with the water hose)

text:
If this slime escapes,
it might quickly ignite the plants outside.

They can't afford to stop extinguishing the fire,
but they can't ignore the slime either.

A merry-go-round of constantly blocking the slime's escape route
with the water hose, and extinguishing the spreading fire.

At a certain moment during the ongoing offense and defense,
the water hose suddenly stopped.

But before [Player] could check the equipment,
a hand was placed on their shoulder, patting it.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well done, [Player] and the others.
Step back for now, I'll take the rear.

name: Slime
text: Furu furu furururu!!!

name: Cinderella
text:
Good grief, don't be so rough.
Flames as you may be, you should be like fluttering feathers—

Cinderella's long hair glows red, and flames overflow.
The flames fill the waterlogged wagon as her will.

name: Cinderella
text:
—Now, let the ball begin.
Are you ready to dance, until you turn to ashes?

name: Cinderella
text:
—Finale.
I hope you've settled down?

name: Slime
text:
Puru...
Puru puru puru...

options.text: The fire on the slime is gone!?
What's going on!?
I don't really get it, but it is amazing.

name: Red Hood
text:
—Sandra can assimilate and control flames with a will
of their own with her own flames.

name: Red Hood
text:
Oh, by the way, I'm the one who stopped the water hose.
Sandra's here, so I figured it was okay to do so.

name: Cinderella
text:
These slimes were probably caught in the fire,
and adapted to emit fire themselves.

name: Cinderella
text:
Thanks to you extinguishing the flames other than the slimes
and keeping them inside, the damage was minimized.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well done, [Player], Yuma.
That was a pretty good first run for your fire extinguishing... 60 points.

options.text: Somehow we managed...
Barely passing, that's harsh!?
Well, it's only natural for us.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
Surprising, are you trying to provoke me?
Well, I have high hopes for you, newbie!

name: Yuma
text:
[Player]!!
You, okay? Hurt anywhere?

name: Yuma
text:
I, I'm fine.
Slimes, security team, protected me.

name: Hogen
text:
Hahaha. By the time I arrived,
it was already suppressed. What reliable young people.

name: Hogen
text:
I was thinking of lending a hand if push comes to shove, but it wasn't necessary.
Well, there were other reasons why I didn't want to show myself.

At Hogen's words, he looked at Cinderella of the fire department with a
complicated expression, and kept some distance from her.

name: Shennong
text:
Two injured, both minor
and have received first aid.

name: Shennong
text:
I'll have to examine you to see
if there will be one more, [Player].

name: Shennong
text:
...No, I'm not angry, I think.
But then, why am I so irritated?

options.text: Everyone's here.
Are you okay, Yuma?
Thanks to you, I could focus on extinguishing the fire.

name: Yuma
text:
I, did my best.
Because, [Player], entrusted me.

name: Shennong
text:
It was Yuma-kun who informed me, so well done.
The problem child here also followed the fire department's instructions...
But you wouldn't even mind taking in my complaints, no?

name: Red Hood
text:
Nice, nice, it's like seeing buddies in action.
It's just like when we first met!

name: Cinderella
text:
....Yeah, you're right.
Yuma, I also have to appreciate your work.

name: Red Hood
text:
But those slimes,
where did they come from?

name: Cinderella
text:
It's unlikely they entered this underground area naturally. This place is sealed.
The most likely possibility is that they were mixed in with the cargo?

name: Oscar
text:
*huff*... *huff*...
Is the situation over?

name: Oscar
text:
—Oh, I am very sorry. I'm aware of the situation.
I've already reported it to the owner.

name: Oscar
text:
I sincerely thank you for your prompt response.
I suppose it was a blessing in disguise that it was before the reopening.

name: Oscar
text:
We'll have to investigate the cause of the slimes' infiltration
and come up with countermeasures for the future...

name: Red Hood
text:
—You know, I ran here at full speed.
I'm thirsty. There were other shops, right?

options.text: It was certainly hot.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Shennong
dialogue_after_selection.text: Hey, hey, this is no situation to be laughing at...?

dialogue_after_selection.name: Hogen
dialogue_after_selection.text: Oh, the great courage, that makes you who you are.

options.text: Come to think of it, I haven't had a drink.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
...Right, came to get, drink with [Player].
Forgot.

options.text: No, no, the investigation comes first!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Cinderella
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I'll give you a passing grade, [Player].
You'll get a perfect score if you can produce results without putting in effort...
Like our big problem child.

name: Cinderella
text:
Leave the investigation of the fire to me.
It's important to let the newcomer gain experience, but—

name: Cinderella
text:
You must be tired from your first on-site experience.
No matter how brave you are. Rest up now.

name: Shennong
text:
I agree with that.
As expected, an experienced firefighter is thorough when it comes to care.

name: Cinderella
text:
Well, I've certainly had my share of experience.
Whether I should be proud of it is another matter.

name: Red Hood
text:
I'll do it too!
I haven't done anything this time!?

name: Cinderella
text:
You, with that attitude, should go comfort your junior.
It was only the wagon that burned, so it'll be over in no time.

name: Oscar
text:
As the person in charge of the site, I'll be present.
Everyone else, please have yourselves a break.

name: Red Hood
text:
Alright, let's go, everyone!
Why don't we go introduce ourselves?

name: Hogen
text:
...Hmm, you have a point.
It's probably a good idea for the teams that
respond to emergencies to get to know each other.

name: Shennong
text:
I've been working hard all day today,
so I think I'll go refresh myself...

name: Red Hood
text:
Oscar-san, Sandra,
remember to come on over here when you guys are done.

name: Cinderella
text:
If you say so, alright.
I'll finish it up quickly.

name: Oscar
text:
Thank you for your consideration,
Red Hood-kun.

And so, with Red Hood in the lead,
Shennong, Hogen, and [Player] follow suit.

name: Yuma
text:
[Player],
a moment?

name: Yuma
text:
I, turned into beast, outside, earlier. Seen, by lot of people.
...Even though, hate most, to be seen, transforming.

name: Yuma
text:
You, relied on me. That, made me happy.
So, didn't mind, being seen.

name: Yuma
text:
I, hate, my body.
But, can help [Player], a little, happy.

options.text: You were very reliable!

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I, happy.
I, for your sake, not scared of people, anymore...
Maybe.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—That's all.
Let's go.
We, left behind.

options.text: We could be good partners.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
I, happy.
I, for your sake, not scared of people, anymore...
Maybe.

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—That's all.
Let's go.
We, left behind.

options.text: (Pat Yuma's head)

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text: Ehehe, [Player], my tamer, be even more—

dialogue_after_selection.name: Yuma
dialogue_after_selection.text:
—Ah! Nothing.
I, turned into beast, so, hot! Want drink, now!!

text:
Yuma starts running to catch up with the
three people walking ahead, pulling [Player] along with him.

And while also introducing themselves, the still-unacquainted group
walked along the artificial beach towards a restaurant.
